meta.title: Navratri Garba Night 2025 | College Events
meta.description: Join us for a night of dance, music, and celebration for Navratri on October 2, 2025.

about.title: About The Event
description: Get ready for the most awaited dance night of the year! Our Navratri Garba Night is a celebration of culture, music, and togetherness. Dress in your most vibrant traditional attire and get ready to dance the night away to the beats of Garba and Dandiya.
The evening will feature a live band, professional singers, and a DJ to keep the energy high. We will also have awards for the best-dressed couple and the best dancer, so bring your best moves!

highlights.title: Last Year's Garba
highlights.caption: See the energy and colors of last year's spectacular event.

categories.title: Live Music
categories.description: Dance to the beats of a professional Garba band.

categories.title: Competitions
categories.description: Win prizes for your costume and dance skills.

categories.title: Food Stalls
categories.description: Enjoy delicious festive snacks and drinks.

articles.title: Get Ready for Garba Night!
articles.excerpt: Join us for a night of dance, music, and celebration.

questions.question: Is there a dress code?
questions.answer: Traditional attire is encouraged to win prizes, but it is not mandatory for entry.

questions.question: Will Dandiya sticks be provided?
questions.answer: A limited number of Dandiya sticks will be available for use at the venue, but you are welcome to bring your own.
